name: Contact Draw: Football
description:
At the choice of the player are presented 90 levels with different complexity and tests to compete in the game there is a timer and leaderboards of Steam.

Get achievements for each level passed and prepare to throw the ball into the ring in the next part.

In-game control | Hot keys

[CTRL] - Start level again (Restart level).
[SPACE] - Continue (Next level).
[ENTER] - Return to the main menu (Home).
